content: as a knitter i am pleased to offer this crochet hat pattern only my 2nd one crochet produces different texture and is usually quick if you make a boo-boo in your project ripping back is relatively painless compared to ripping back in a knit project this hat is worked in the round from the top down and uses the following crochet stitches chain slip_stitch single and double_crochet stitches and cluster stitch the pattern is written using american crochet terms the sample hat was made using worsted weight yarn and a j hook and was completed in less than 3 hours for crochet beginners links to helpful videos are provided in the pattern give it a try because if you don t how will you know
